articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: Google issues ‘voluntary exit’ program for Android, Chrome, and Pixel employees - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google SVP Rick Osterloh issued an internal memo to the Pixel/Android/Chrome team Thursday, announcing a “voluntary exit program.” TechCrunch has
articles.content: Google SVP Rick Osterloh issued an internal memo to the Pixel/Android/Chrome team Thursday, announcing a voluntary exit program. TechCrunch has confirmed the letters existence with the company, after… [+1747 chars]
